user.professionalExperienceSummary: Experienced in developing pixel-perfect UI/UX consumer-facing Single Page Application (SPAs)

description: Developed cross-browser “Robin” web app afresh using React JS, Google Maps API, Geolocation API, and React Animation.
The app records events and performs face and speech recognition. These details of the events are made available using the Maps API v3 Info window.
Designed and developed features like Filter, Feedback, and Map modules.
Created SVGs for location markers, allowing users to pan to the events that are the most recent events or closest to the user’s location.
Achieved improved user experience in filter-based search by implementing features like slider filtering and autocomplete API.
Developed cross-browser “Robin” web app afresh using React JS, Google Maps API, Geolocation API, and React Animation.
The app records events and performs face and speech recognition. These details of the events are made available using the Maps API v3 Info window.
Designed and developed features like Filter, Feedback, and Map modules.
Created SVGs for location markers, allowing users to pan to the events that are the most recent events or closest to the user’s location.
Achieved improved user experience in filter-based search by implementing features like slider filtering and autocomplete API.
Responsible for the development and maintenance of iOS & Android apps using React-native.
The app helps brands collaborate with influencers, analyze their reach, and keep track of their appointments with invoices.
Developed a significant version of the app with features like Onboarding Screens, Feed, Campaigns, and Invoice modules
Implemented a single source of truth for the app’s state using mobx, decreasing the app’s load-time by 2-4 seconds.
Integrated and developed UI's for Accounts, Modal Views, login, Analytics page
Responsible for completing MEAN-Stack App - LinkedIn clone. It assisted me with an opportunity to lead a team of 10 developers.
Developed dynamic workflows, validation rules/approval process, & auto-response emails using Salesforce Apex.
Implemented RBAC, public groups, and role hierarchies.

projects.name: The SBG Store
details: A Multi-platform ReactJS web/mobile app, which showcases the cuisines of a restaurant.
Implemented Redux-Thunk architecture to manage the state of the application.
The Server-side implemented a Role-Based access control mechanism(RBAC).
The users were authenticated into the system, using OAuth and OAuth2 protocols.

projects.name: ITSATIS
details: The developed algorithm implemented Master-slave architecture using IoT and Image Processing to detect the lane's density.
The detected density is sent to the parent module (ITS) to calculate the lane's green time.
TIS utilizes this data and provides real-time traffic information
AWS Rekognition module helped achieve better accuracy in car object & license plate detection.

projects.name: Restaurant App (Admin Portal)
details: Developed an order management application using Angular framework, users view cuisines, cart, and place orders once authenticated.
RESTful APIs implemented a callback design model. The server integrated the JOI library to perform data validation.
Designed a MongoDB schema using mongoose ORM. It utilized cloud database services for maximum availability.

projects.name: ITSATIS
details: The developed algorithm implemented using Image Processing to detect the lane's density.
It also identified an additional attribute - License Plate of a vehicle which can be further utilized to identify vehicle's identity
The detected density is sent to the parent module (ITS) to calculate the lane's green time.

projects.name: Wine Quality Tester
details: Implemented the Random-Forest Classifier algorithm using the python’s pySpark MlLib library to predict the wine quality.
Parallel-model training was implemented, using AWS EMR and Docker’s container management.
